newsitem.title: USA: Regal to acquire 95 screens for $24.5 mln.
newsitem.headline: Regal to acquire 95 screens for $24.5 mln.

text.p: Regal Cinemas Inc said Thursday it has signed a definitive asset purchase agreement to buy 95 screens from Magic Cinemas LLC for $24.5 million, cash.
Regal will acquire 36 screens in five theaters that Magic Cinemas currently has in operation, 52 screens under development and a seven-screen addition to an existing theatre.
The company said that as with other acquired properties, it expects to be able to add screens to the theatres as increasing demand warrants.

Regal also said it intends to fund the transaction, which is expected to close in April, with cash on hand and borrowings available under its credit facility. The consummation of the transaction is subject to customary closing conditions.
Magic Cinemas is an independent theater operator with properties in New Jersey and Pennsylvania. Regal currently has 157 multi-screen theaters in operation with an aggregate of 1,295 screens.
